document_data.mainbody:
Alkindus was a Netherese arcanist who performed their research at the Shadow Consortium before its destruction in .
Following the disappearance of the institutes founder, Shadow, Alkindus performed experimental research into the planes at the head of a small team. Focusing on the unlikely possibilities of semiplanes and antiplanes, she was aided by Janin, Pringle, Vanderanus, and Shiris Blamira.
